### **Master of Science** (Business Intelligence and Analytics)

*   [**Programme Educational Objectives**](https://fai.utm.my/master-of-science-business-intelligence-and-analytics#uagb-tabs__tab1)

###### **Overview**

The goal of this program is to produce ICT professionals who have advanced knowledge and skills in the field of Business Intelligence and data analytics. They will not only gain knowledge and skills in manipulating and analyzing data, in fact, they will also equipped with knowledge and skill as analysts in Business Intelligence, which seeks to design and implement an analytical transformation into a leading organization in accordance with the current needs of the country.

[MQA](https://www2.mqa.gov.my/mqr/english/epapariptaAA.cfm?IDAkrKP=17088)

###### **Programme Educational Objectives**

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Mastery in advanced knowledge of Business Intelligence and Analytics to effectively support organizational decision making.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Resilient and prominent leader in organization in solving complex organizational problems through research, innovation and creativity.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Adaptable and responsible with high ethical conduct as a leader in organizations and communities.

###### **Learning Outcomes**

Upon completion of the program requirements, the graduate will be able to:

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Synthesize advanced information, concept, theory and specialized method to manage and resolve problems in business intelligence and analytics.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Construct solutions to complex problems related to business intelligence and analytics.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Apply practical and technical skills in business intelligence and analytics to develop effective solutions.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Collaborate with different people in learning and working communities and with other groups ethically and professionally.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Communicate clearly the knowledge, skills and ideas using appropriate methods to peers and clients either experts or non-experts.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Use a wide range of suitable digital technologies and appropriate software competently for business intelligence and analytics problem solutions.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Apply mathematical or statistical and other quantitative elements in business information management for analysis, reporting and information delivery.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate autonomy, leadership and responsibility in managing work within own team or with other teams in various situations.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate self-advancement through continuous academic or professional development.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Lead or initiate entrepreneurial ventures or projects in business intelligence and analytics.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate adherence to ethical and professional codes of practice in executing work.

Detailed requirements of **Master of Science** (Business Intelligence and Analytics) programme.

###### **Entry Requirements**

The normal requirement for admission to the programme is a four-year bachelor degree recognized by the university in either engineering or sciences.

[All Information](https://admission.utm.my/)

[Local Student](https://admission.utm.my/malaysian-postgraduate-study/)

[International Student](https://admission.utm.my/international-postgraduate-study/)

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Quantitative Researcher

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Data Mining Engineer

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Quantitative Analyst

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Chief Data Officer

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Financial Analyst

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Big Data Analyst

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Data Architect

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Data Scientist

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Data Analyst
